sentence.Network_en: Dr. Ramsay, opening his mouth, threw back his head and laughed immoderately.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉姆齐医生张开口, 脑袋往后一仰,放肆地大笑起来.

sentence.Network_en: His gravity made us laugh immoderately.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那一本正经的样子,使我们笑得不可开交.

sentence.Network_en: To indulge oneself immoderately, as wallowing in self - pity.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果一个人过度放纵自己, 就会陷入自怨自艾之中.
